title: ITALIC and SMALL CAP
content:
I should know this .... but i'm not the best with text faces.

anyone recognize?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012062512im_/http:/typophile.com/files/unk_4545.jpg)
author: beejay

comments.content:
ah perfect.

thanks a bunch Stephen and Marc (not Mark, doh, brainlock, sorry about that) ;)

Yes, as available in the OpenType [Adobe Jenson Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012062512/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/adobe_jenson_pro_ot/?sample_text=AaBbCc%20Handgloves&sample_size=36&acs_ss=18&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1). (See the character set.)
